name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Maps Scraper | Leads Extractor by LeadStal

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automate the extraction of business data, names, addresses, photos, websites, emails and social links and download esv/excels files.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extract Business Information from Bing Maps.
With this tool, you can seamlessly search for businesses and extract key information, including business names, addresses, photos, coordinates, websites, emails, and social media profiles, directly from Bing Maps.
The Ultimate "Maps Scraper & Leads Extractor" is your go-to solution for optimizing lead generation and boosting productivity. With just a click of the " Generate Leads" button, this tool efficiently compiles valuable data into a downloadable Excel or CSV file, ready for your next marketing or sales campaign.
Whether you're a sales expert, marketer, or business owner, this tool simplifies the process of creating a database of high-quality leads, saving you time and effort.
Key Features:
⭐ Extract comprehensive business details from Bing Maps effortlessly.
⭐ Collect valuable leads, including email addresses, website links, and social media profiles.
⭐ Export data into Excel or CSV for easy analysis and integration with CRM tools.
⭐: Simplify your lead generation process and maximize productivity.
Who Benefits from This Tool?
✅ B2B Small Marketers – Quickly gather essential business data to drive your next big campaign.
✅ All SaaS Companies – Empower your outreach teams to expand and retain your customer base effectively.
✅All Sales Professionals – Build extensive client databases to close deals faster.
✅ All Marketing Agency – Save time while scaling your outreach and growing your user base efficiently.

What Type of Data Can You Scrape via Our Google Maps Extractor:
🏢 Business Name: Complete registered business name, including legal suffixes (LLC, Inc.) and DBA variations
📧 Email Address: Verified contact emails from Google Maps listings and associated websites, ensuring deliverability and multiple contact points
📞 Phone Number: Primary and secondary contact numbers, formatted consistently for easy CRM integration
📍 Physical Address: Full location details including street address, unit numbers, city, state, ZIP code, and additional landmark information
🏅 Verified Status: Google Maps verification badge indicating listing authenticity and last update time
📝 Business Subtitle: Detailed descriptions and taglines revealing business specialties and service offerings
🏷️ Category: Comprehensive business classification including primary and secondary industry categories
⭐ Rating Score: Precise customer rating on a 1-5 star scale, including decimal points for reputation assessment
💬 Review Count: Total number of customer reviews, providing insights into business popularity and customer engagement
🌐 Website URL: Direct links to official business websites, verified for validity and capturing alternative domains
🤝 Social Media: Connected social profile links with potential engagement metrics
🗺️ Geographic Data: Exact latitude and longitude coordinates for advanced geographical targeting and analysis
